code: import React from"react";import Carousel from"react-bootstrap/Carousel";import{brandsItem1,brandsItem2,brandsItem3}from"../SliderBrands/SliderBrandsData";import"./SliderBrands.css";import{Link}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const SliderBrands=()=>{const settings={controls:false,indicators:true};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container text-center my-3 mt-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:"BRANDS"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Carousel,{...settings,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Carousel.Item,{className:"row",children:brandsItem1.map((brand,i)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-2 float-left",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:{pathname:"/menu",state:{id:brand.name}},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"img-fluid",src:brand.url,alt:brand.name})})},i);})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Carousel.Item,{className:"row",children:brandsItem2.map((brand,i)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-2 float-left",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:{pathname:"/menu",state:{id:brand.name}},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"img-fluid",src:brand.url,alt:brand.name})})},i);})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Carousel.Item,{className:"row",children:brandsItem3.map((brand,i)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"col-2 float-left",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:{pathname:"/menu",state:{id:brand.name}},children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"img-fluid",src:brand.url,alt:brand.name})})},i);})})]})]});};export default SliderBrands;
